#Text= Katara says : " You mean , after all Roku and Sozin went through together , even after Roku showed him mercy , Sozin betrayed him like that ?

column1: #Text=" Toph says : " It 's like these people are born bad .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , that 's wrong .
#Text=I do n't think that was the point of what Roku showed me at all .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then what was the point ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Roku was just as much Fire Nation as Sozin was , right ?
#Text=If anything , their story proves anyone 's capable of great good and great evil .
#Text=Everyone , even the Fire Lord and the Fire Nation have to be treated like they 're worth giving a chance .
#Text=And I also think it was about friendships .
#Text=" Toph says : " Do you really think friendships can last more than one lifetime ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't see why not .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , scientifically speaking , there 's no way to prove that ... " Katara says : " Oh , Sokka , just hold hands .

#Text=" Main Aang Fang ( flashback only ) Roku Zuko Antagonists Sozin ( flashback only ) Sozin 's dragon ( flashback only ) says : " Minor Appa Fire Sages ( flashback only ) Gyatso ( flashback only ) Iroh Katara Roku 's waterbending master ( flashback only ) Sokka Sud ( flashback only ) Ta Min ( flashback only ) Ta Min 's friend ( flashback only ) Toph " Qin says : " This drill is a feat of scientific ingenuity and raw destructive power .
#Text=Once it tunnels through the wall , our troops will storm their city .
#Text=The Earth Kingdom will finally fall , and you can claim Ba Sing Se in the name of your father .
#Text=Nothing can stop us .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Hmmm , what about those muscle - y guys down there ?
#Text=" Qin says : " Please .
#Text=The drill 's metal shell is impervious to any earthbending attack .
#Text=" Azula says : " Oh , I 'm sure it is , War Minister Qin , but just to be on the safe side ... Mai and Ty Lee , take the earthbenders out !
#Text=" Mai says : " Finally , something to do .
#Text="
